con:part.con:content: <definitions targetNamespace="claro-webservices" xmlns:SOAP-ENV="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:SOAP-ENC="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/" xmlns:tns="claro-webservices" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/"> <types> <xsd:schema targetNamespace="claro-webservices"> <xsd:import namespace="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/"/> <xsd:complexType name="ArrayOfString"> <xsd:element name="st_item" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="ArrayOfArray"> <xsd:element name="arr_item" type="tns:ArrayOfString" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema> </types> <message name="listaNegraRequest"> <part name="movil" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="accion" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="pass" type="xsd:string"/> </message> <message name="listaNegraResponse"> <part name="return" type="tns:ArrayOfString"/> </message> <message name="consultaServiciosRequest"> <part name="movil" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="pass" type="xsd:string"/> </message> <message name="consultaServiciosResponse"> <part name="return" type="tns:ArrayOfArray"/> </message> <message name="bajaServiciosRequest"> <part name="movil" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="servicio" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="mcorta" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="pass" type="xsd:string"/> </message> <message name="bajaServiciosResponse"> <part name="return" type="tns:ArrayOfString"/> </message> <message name="altaServicioRequest"> <part name="movil" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="servicio" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="marcacion" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="pass" type="xsd:string"/> </message> <message name="altaServicioResponse"> <part name="return" type="tns:ArrayOfString"/> </message> <portType name="ClaroWebServicePortType"> <operation name="listaNegra"> <input message="tns:listaNegraRequest"/> <output message="tns:listaNegraResponse"/> </operation> <operation name="consultaServicios"> <input message="tns:consultaServiciosRequest"/> <output message="tns:consultaServiciosResponse"/> </operation> <operation name="bajaServicios"> <input message="tns:bajaServiciosRequest"/> <output message="tns:bajaServiciosResponse"/> </operation> <operation name="altaServicio"> <input message="tns:altaServicioRequest"/> <output message="tns:altaServicioResponse"/> </operation> </portType> <binding name="ClaroWebServiceBinding" type="tns:ClaroWebServicePortType"> <soap:binding style="rpc" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <operation name="listaNegra"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://corp.esmoviles.com/public/Subscriptions/webservice/claroWebService/claroWebService.php/listaNegra" style="rpc"/> <input> <soap:body use="encoded" namespace="claro-webservices" encodingStyle="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/"/> </input> <output> <soap:body use="encoded" namespace="claro-webservices" encodingStyle="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/"/> </output> </operation> <operation name="consultaServicios"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://corp.esmoviles.com/public/Subscriptions/webservice/claroWebService/claroWebService.php/consultaServicios" style="rpc"/> <input> <soap:body use="encoded" namespace="claro-webservices" encodingStyle="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/"/> </input> <output> <soap:body use="encoded" namespace="claro-webservices" encodingStyle="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/"/> </output> </operation> <operation name="bajaServicios"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://corp.esmoviles.com/public/Subscriptions/webservice/claroWebService/claroWebService.php/bajaServicios" style="rpc"/> <input> <soap:body use="encoded" namespace="claro-webservices" encodingStyle="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/"/> </input> <output> <soap:body use="encoded" namespace="claro-webservices" encodingStyle="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/"/> </output> </operation> <operation name="altaServicio"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://corp.esmoviles.com/public/Subscriptions/webservice/claroWebService/claroWebService.php/altaServicio" style="rpc"/> <input> <soap:body use="encoded" namespace="claro-webservices" encodingStyle="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/"/> </input> <output> <soap:body use="encoded" namespace="claro-webservices" encodingStyle="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/"/> </output> </operation> </binding> <service name="ClaroWebService"> <port name="ClaroWebServicePort" binding="tns:ClaroWebServiceBinding"> <soap:address location="http://corp.esmoviles.com/public/Subscriptions/webservice/claroWebService/claroWebService.php"/> </port> </service> </definitions>
